## Room.joinRoom() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> 本重载已弃用, 将在下个版本移除!!
> 

加入指定房间, 成功则可使用 this.currRoomInfo 可获取当前所在的房间信息

**Signature:**

```typescript
joinRoom(playerPara: IPlayerInfoPara, roomId: string, teamId?: string): Promise<IResult<IRoomInfo>>;
```
